section.title: Groups
section.para: To have one or more Users grouped together, Beaker uses Groups. Systems can belong to one or more Groups.

section.title: Adding a Group
section.para: Groups can only be created/edited by a User in the Admin Group. To add a new Group go to Admin->Groups and click the Add( + ) link at the bottom left. You'll then be prompted to enter a Display Name and a Group Name. The former is the name that users of Beaker will see, and the latter is the name used internally. It's fine to have these names the same, or different.
